ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <5> 55mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter + <6> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<7> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case + <8> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> LCD Screen Protectors + <12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> Image Recovery Software
